```{r setup}
library(ggsmatr)
data(iris)
library(smatr)
fit <- sma(Petal.Width ~ Petal.Length+ Species, data=iris)
ggsmatr(data =  iris, groups = "Species", xvar =  "Petal.Length", yvar = "Petal.Width", sma.fit =  fit)
```
